Create a temp Image background

Example

Creates a temporary image background

With a blob (using enconding base64 or binary string)

curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST / -d '{"blob": { "data": "asfsadf", "extension": "png", enconding: 'base64'}}' / https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/images/backgrounds.json

With a url

curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST / -d '{"url": "http://mycdn.com/image.png" }' / https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/images/backgrounds.json
